meanings.definition: A plant of the parsley family with aromatic roots and seeds.
meanings.sent1: The angelicas in the garden have a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: I planted some angelicas in my backyard for their fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The angelicas whispered secrets to the neighboring flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like angelicas, spreading a sweet aroma in the room.
meanings.sent5: The angelicas swayed gently in the breeze, releasing their delightful scent.

meanings.definition: A sweet, aromatic liqueur made from the roots of the angelica plant.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a glass of angelicas after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying the angelicas cocktail.
meanings.sent3: The angelicas danced in the glass, tempting her to take a sip.
meanings.sent4: His laughter filled the room like the aroma of angelicas.
meanings.sent5: The angelicas liqueur left a lingering sweetness on her lips.
